debt_section: Total debt: $67,150 million. Notes with rates from 0.80% to 5.20%. Maturities: 2024: $8,300M, 2025: $3,600M, 2026: $6,400M, 2027: $7,150M, 2028: $4,700M, Thereafter: $37,000M.
earnings_excerpt: Andy Jassy: Revenue $574 billion. AWS revenue $91 billion, up 13%. Brian Olsavsky: Operating income $36.9 billion.
